sentences.en: “The cowboy mellowed out when they read him a sweet letter from his wife”(&b{Bobbie Ann Mason})
sentences.cn: “当他们给他念了他妻子的来信后，这个牛仔变得乐陶陶的”(&b{鲍比·安·梅森})

sentences.en: A few more years will mellow the wine.
sentences.cn: 年头多将使酒醇香可口.

sentences.en: Apples mellow after they have been picked.
At the other tables couples were now in a mellow mood, chattering happily and drinking.
sentences.cn: 其他桌上的情侣们正一边饮酒一边畅谈，兴致很高。

sentences.en: He'd had a few glasses of champagne himself and was fairly mellow.
sentences.cn: 他自己也已几杯香槟下肚，很是飘飘然。

sentences.en: His voice was deep and mellow and his speech had a soothing and comforting quality.
sentences.cn: 他的嗓音低沉悦耳，他的讲话能抚慰人心。

sentences.en: His voice was deep and mellow.
I'd had two glass of wine and I was feeling mellow.
sentences.cn: 我喝了两杯葡萄酒,顿时觉得心旷神怡.

sentences.en: I've seen him grow more mellow over the years.
sentences.cn: 这些年来,我看到他变得更加圆熟了.

sentences.en: Is she more mellow and tolerant?
It is a kind of mellow wine fom Shao xing.
sentences.cn: 这是绍兴出产的一种醇酒.

sentences.en: Mellow music and lighting helped to create the right atmosphere.
sentences.cn: 柔和的音乐和灯光衬托出了适宜的氛围。

sentences.en: the mellow golden light of early evening
sentences.cn: 傍晚时分柔和的金色光线

sentences.en: The mellow November sun came streaming into the room.
These apples are mellow at this time of year.
sentences.cn: 每年这时节,苹果就熟透了.

sentences.en: Thinking of departed friends is to me something sweet and mellow.
sentences.cn: 对我来讲,与朋友分手是件美事.

trans.tran_cn: （瓜，果等）成熟的，（酒）芳醇的，（颜色或声音）柔和的，圆润的
trans.tran_en: a mellow colour or light looks soft, warm, and not too bright
